text: Ana Salas Lozano (born 12 July 1972) is a Spanish former professional tennis player. A right-handed player from Madrid, Salas reached a best singles ranking on tour of 275, with four ITF titles. In 1998 she received a wildcard into the main draw of her home WTA Tour tournament, the Madrid Open, where she was beaten in the first round by Meike Babel. ==ITF finals== ===Singles: 8 (4–4)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% |- !
